cluster_classes.class_description: Processes involved in the treatment of sour water containing hydrogen sulfide, including associated chemicals and units.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: treating sour water by removing contaminants.

cluster_classes.class_description: A process unit designed to separate components at reduced pressure to lower their boiling points.

members.entity_description: A process unit used to remove hydrogen sulfide and ammonia from sour water.

cluster_classes.class_description: Chemicals (amines) used in amine treating processes to remove H2S and CO2 from hydrocarbon streams.

cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: used in amine treating to remove H2S and CO2.

members.entity_description: A chemical used in amine treating to remove H2S and CO2 from hydrocarbon streams.

cluster_classes.class_description: Materials used in amine treating processes, not strictly classified as chemicals.

args.new_description: Chemicals and materials (amines) used in amine treating processes to remove H2S and CO2 from hydrocarbon streams.
args.justification: All three classes represent amine-based chemicals/materials used in treating processes, with overlapping entity evidence and nearly identical descriptions; distinction between 'chemical' and 'material' is not meaningful here.
Entity is an amine chemical used in treating processes and fits the merged class.
Entities are amine chemicals/materials used in treating processes and fit the merged class.
Merged class should be grouped with other process-related classes for schema coherence.
Class_Group assignment confirmed for process-related class.
